message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with delay-constrained beamforming control for downlink multi-user MIMO systems with imperfect channel state information at the transmitter. This involves topics related to information theory (cs.IT), networking and internet architecture (cs.NI), control and systems engineering (cs.SY), multimedia (cs.MM), and machine learning (cs.LG) as the authors propose a partially observed Markov decision process and use perturbation analysis and semidefinite relaxation techniques to solve the problem.
